publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3562 Pauline McNeill: Maggie's Centre - Westen Infirmary, Glasgow-That the Parliament warmly welcomes the opening of the new Maggie's Centre in the Western Infirmary gatehouse in Glasgow which will specialise in supporting people with cancer, carers and their families and includes an extensive cancer information library and internet access; expresses its delight at the overwhelming public support in Glasgow for the Maggie's Centre, and congratulates all those who have participated in fund-raising efforts to make the centre possible.
S1M-3562 Maggie's Centre - Westen Infirmary, Glasgow (lodged on 11 November 2002) Stewart Stevenson*
S1M-3562 Maggie's Centre - Westen Infirmary, Glasgow (lodged on 11 November 2002) Mary Scanlon*, Christine Grahame*

S1M-3562 Pauline McNeill: Maggie's Centre - Westen Infirmary, Glasgow-That the Parliament warmly welcomes the opening of the new Maggie's Centre in the Western Infirmary gatehouse in Glasgow which will specialise in supporting people with cancer, carers and their families and includes an extensive cancer information library and internet access; expresses its delight at the overwhelming public support in Glasgow for the Maggie's Centre, and congratulates all those who have participated in fund-raising efforts to make the centre possible. Supported by: Stewart Stevenson, Mary Scanlon, Christine Grahame
S1M-3562 Maggie's Centre - Westen Infirmary, Glasgow (lodged on 11 November 2002) Donald Gorrie*, Fiona Hyslop*
S1M-3562 Maggie's Centre - Westen Infirmary, Glasgow (lodged on 11 November 2002) Irene Oldfather*, Mr Tom McCabe*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Brian Fitzpatrick*
S1M-3562 Maggie's Centre - Westen Infirmary, Glasgow (lodged on 11 November 2002) Trish Godman*, Tommy Sheridan*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Ms Sandra White*, Bill Butler*
S1M-3562 Maggie's Centre - Westen Infirmary, Glasgow (lodged on 11 November 2002) Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh*, Fergus Ewing*
S1M-3562 Maggie's Centre - Westen Infirmary, Glasgow (lodged on 11 November 2002) Mr Jamie Stone*
S1M-3562 Maggie's Centre - Westen Infirmary, Glasgow (lodged on 11 November 2002) Johann Lamont*, Mr Keith Harding*, Fiona McLeod*
S1M-3562 Maggie's Centre - Westen Infirmary, Glasgow (lodged on 11 November 2002) Mr Michael McMahon*
S1M-3562 Maggie's Centre - Western Infirmary, Glasgow (lodged on 11 November 2002) Andrew Wilson*
S1M-3562 Maggie's Centre - Western Infirmary, Glasgow (lodged on 11 November 2002) Elaine Smith*
